Posts.EditableText: It looks like the interface (ui) for the show menu stuff allows multi-select via ctrl+click. However, result appears to contain just a single selection. Is it a bug that it allows multi-select? If not, how can I access the list of selected items?
Posts.HTML: It looks like the interface (ui) for the show menu stuff allows multi-select via ctrl+click. However, result appears to contain just a single selection. Is it a bug that it allows multi-select? If not, how can I access the list of selected items?

Posts.EditableText: Yes this seems to be a bug. I will add it to the issue tracker
